id: scenario-governance-researcher-scenarios-national-investigate whether protocol governance quality degrades as it scales
title: Investigate whether protocol governance quality degrades as it scales
description: Investigate whether protocol governance quality degrades as it scales
content:
Scenario: Investigate whether protocol governance quality degrades as it scales
    Given protocol expanded from dozens to thousands of communities
    When James examines governance quality metrics over scale
    Then he tracks Constitutional Council deliberation quality
    And he measures appeal resolution fairness over time
    And he examines whether coordination complexity overwhelms benefits
    And he finds quality generally sustains but identifies scaling challenges
    And research informs protocol architecture improvements
